meanings.definition: A small amount of something that remains after the main part has gone or been taken or used.
meanings.sent1: After baking the cake, there was a residue of flour on the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent2: The residue of the soap bar clung to the sink after it was used.
meanings.sent3: The residue of laughter filled the room long after the joke was told.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness left a residue of warmth in his heart.
meanings.sent5: The residue of memories lingered in the old photo album.

meanings.definition: The part of something that remains when the main part is removed.
meanings.sent1: The residue of the tree stump stood tall in the clearing.
meanings.sent2: She carefully removed the residue of the sticker from the book cover.
meanings.sent3: The residue of the puzzle pieces left behind a mystery.
meanings.sent4: His absence left a residue of silence in the room.
meanings.sent5: The residue of paint on the canvas hinted at the artist's vision.
